message: Let's start with a fair split. We can always negotiate more in future rounds.
You were too generous last round, let's try to get a better deal this time!
You think I was too generous last round? You're not making a great deal now, either!
You're trying to take advantage of me, Bob? I'll give you a slightly better deal this time.
I'm not giving up yet, Alice. You can do better than that!
You think you're getting a good deal? I'm not giving up yet, either!
You're not getting any younger, Bob. Let's settle this already!
I'm not getting any older, Alice. I'm just getting more determined to get a good deal!
You're not getting any more determined, Bob. You're just getting more annoying!
You're running out of time, Bob. I'm not getting any more generous!
I'm not panicking, Alice. I'm just getting strategic. You're not getting the best of me yet!
You think you're being strategic, Bob? You're just being greedy!
You're running out of time, Bob. I'm not going to let you walk all over me!
You're getting desperate, Alice. I'm not going to let you take advantage of me now!
You think I'm desperate? You're the one who's getting greedy, Bob!
You're almost out of time, Bob. I'm not going to make it easy for you to get everything!
It's now or never, Alice. Take it or leave it!
Fine, Bob. You got the better deal. Congratulations.
